CustomField.formula:
IF( Rollup_Discount_QLG_Manager__c >=1, IMAGE("/resource/1649153114000/CircleRed", "Red" , 20, 20) &" "& "Approbation Directeur", IF( Approval_required__c = TRUE, IMAGE("/resource/1649153081000/CircleOrange?", "Orange" , 20, 20) &" "& "Approbation Manager", IMAGE("/resource/1649153059000/CircleGreen?", "Orange" , 20, 20) &" "& "Pas d'approbation"
))
CustomField.label: Approbation
